arts.ttl: PSG vs Lens – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain and Racing Club de Lens go head-to-head at the Parc des Princes on Sunday in Ligue 1 action. Both sides will be looking to continue their positive starts to the season, with PSG sitting top of the table and Lens in sixth.
